name: Rush Party
description:
Controls:

Space - interact

Shift - drop item

Arrow - move

mouse hover + Space - turn a pipe

A 2D top down view game where you play a teenager who wakes up after a party and has to clean everything before his parents come back home.

this game was made during the Global Game Jam 2020 

theme was : "repair"

Team : 

Simon - Dev

Osmane - Dev

Antonin - Game design

Dylan - Level design

Jibier - Graphic art

Vô - Graphic art
